3: At this moment, the surrounding scenery begins to tremble relentlessly—
It's a friendly signal. Did support come?
Nanami's done taking a walk inside, so I'm out here for a nice breath of fresh air.
No, I didn't mean it like that...
Nanami wants to see more M.I.N.D.s too!
Hahaha, you can only see it if you stick your consciousness inside these devices!
Then let's stick it right in, brother!
W-wait, what are you trying to do!
